synopsis.text: Dark Lord vanquished, and the realm of Alayzard saved, the valiant hero Akatsuki Ousawa returns to Earth, accompanied by an unusual companion: Miu, the voluptuous daughter of the defeated Demon King. To blend into their new life, they pose as siblings, enrolling in BABEL, a specialized academy for interdimensional travelers who've returned with extraordinary abilities. As Akatsuki struggles to control his newfound powers and resist the allure of his fellow students, Miu's ever-growing proportions threaten to expose their secret. Meanwhile, hidden agendas and sinister plots lurk in the shadows, as the true purpose of BABEL remains shrouded in mystery. With the threat of their peaceful lives crumbling, can Akatsuki and Miu uncover the forces at play and protect their secret, or will their new adventure prove too perilous to handle?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
